Pairing Bittle to your Android device:

 		1. Swipe down from the top of the screen.
 		2. Touch and hold Bluetooth icon.
 		3. Tap Connecting to Bittle:

.
 		4. Tap the name of Bittle.
 		5. Use the following pin code: Controlling Bittle:

 or Pair new device.




0000 		1. In this App, tap 1234 button.
 		2. Select Bittle in paired devices list.




PAIRED DEVICES 		· Use the Joystick to control Bittle's movement.
 		· Tap REST to turn off Bittle's servos.
 		· Tap GYRO to turn on/off Bittle's gyroscope.
 		· Tap STAND to put Bittle in it's neutral standing posture.
 		· Tap STEP to make Bittle step in it's current position.
 		· Tap CRAWL to set crawling gait.
 		· Tap WALK to set walking gait.
 		· Tap TROT to set trotting gait.
 		· Tap DISCONNECT to turn off Bittle's servos and exit.
